title: Babylon Pro 9.0.1.5 With Patch
description:
*Patch Included 

Instructions-

*Disconnect internet first !

* Uninstall any previous version , reboot or log off and log on

*Remove the babylon installation directory from the default root [c:/program files]
 Clean reg if possible.
 
*Install the software

*quit any dialogue pop-ups

*quit/exit bablyon from taskbar

*RUN PATCH AS ADMINISTRATOR [otherwise it will fail]

*click apply patch , search bablyon.exe , patching done!

*Enjoy!


SEED AND SHARE!

CLICK ON MY USERNAME FOR MORE!
